title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build more effective agents through model customization (AIM383)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过模型定制构建更有效的智能体 (AIM383)
abstract: ​Agentic applications interpret inputs and take actions within a customer’s enterprise environment, and model customization enables agents that understand the business and provides responses or actions that are appropriate for the use case. In this session, we will cover recent advancements like Nova customization on SageMaker AI and on-demand inferences on custom models, which lower the cost and effort needed for model customization. Explore customization techniques available through available recipes, walk through how you can enjoy the same low on-demand inference prices with your custom models, and learn how custom Nova models improve the price-performance for agentic use cases.
abstract_cn: 代理应用程序解释输入并在客户的企业环境中执行操作，模型定制使代理能够理解业务并提供适合用例的响应或操作。在本次会议中，我们将介绍最新进展，如SageMaker AI上的Nova定制和自定义模型的按需推理，这些功能降低了模型定制所需的成本和工作量。探索通过可用配方提供的定制技术，了解如何在自定义模型上享受相同的低按需推理价格，并学习自定义Nova模型如何改善代理用例的性价比。

presenter.name: Sam Palani
presenter.title: WW Leader, Amazon Nova SSA & Data Science
